nodes.text: Nonnie Griffin (born around 1933) is a Canadian actress. She studied at the Toronto Conservatory in her native land, the Royal Academy of Dramatic Arts in London, and even with famed mime artist Marcel Marceau. She voiced Shodu Warrick on the animated TV series Ewoks.

Apart from being a veteran of the stage, she played Harmony Bear in 1986's The Care Bears Movie II: A New Generation. She voiced Polite Panda in the Care Bears television episode "The Long Lost Care Bears" and Mrs. Pig in two episodes of The Raccoons. She has appeared on camera on TV shows including Kung Fu: The Legend Continues, King of Kensington, RoboCop: The Series, Forever Knight, Street Legal, Doc, Bizarre and Strange Paradise. She also appeared in films such as The Believers, The Abduction, Good Fences, A Husband, a Wife and a Lover and If You Could See What I Hear.
